#####
**Logical Operators**

```{r}
x <- 10
x < 20
```
```{r}
x > 5
```
```{r}
(x < 20) & (x > 5)
```
```{r}
(x < 20) | (x > 5)
```
```{r}
x != 10
```
#####
**Conditional statements**

```{r}
temp <- 45

if (temp > 80){
  print('Hot')
} else if(temp <= 80 & temp >= 40){
  print('Medium')
} else{
  print('Cool')
}
```
